name: David Ravenhill
description:
David Ravenhill ( - )
Listen to freely downloadable audio sermons by the speaker David Ravenhill in mp3 format. David Ravenhill was born in England in 1942. He graduated from Bethany Fellowship BibleCollege in Minneapolis where he met and married his wife Nancy. In their early years, David and Nancy served with David WilkersonÂ’s first Teen Challenge Center in New York City. Following that, they worked with YWAM (Youth With A Mission) for six years which included two years in Port Moresby, Papua, New Guinea.
From 1993 David served as the senior pastor of a thriving church in Gig Harbor, Washington. He resigned in 1997 to commence a full time itinerant ministry throughout the United States and overseas. David also taught in the Brownsville Revival School of Ministry in Pensacola, Florida as well as maintaining a busy itinerant ministry. During and following their time in Pensacola David traveled with Evangelist Steve Hill and the Awake America Crusades. You can find our more about his speaking and request him for your Church as this ministry website DavidRavenhill.com

sermons.title: (Deeper Waters) Session 1 - The Purpose of the Cross
sermons.description: This sermon examines the purpose of Jesus Christ's sacrifice on the cross, not only from man's perspective (saving self from hell) but from God's perspective as well (developing a relationship for life).

sermons.title: The Necessity of Forgiving One Another
sermons.description: David Ravenhill speaks on the topic of forgiveness. He shares many powerful illustrations and testimonies of true forgiveness from the heart. He starts to share from Scripture on the need for us to release others and forgive others as the Lord has had mercy on us. This sermon will set you free from the bondage of unforgiveness in your life.

sermons.title: The Presence of God
sermons.description: Man commonly focus on the parts rather than the whole. As such, there is a tendency for Christians to over-emphasize a particular truth rather than the whole counsel of God. All these truths are found in the Person of the Lord Jesus Christ. The thing that sets us apart from the world is the Presence of God in our midst, and it is His Presence that we should seek after. Let it not be said of us as it is in Job 26:14 that "these are parts of his ways: but how little a portion is heard of him?"

From 1993 David served as the senior pastor of a thriving church in Gig Harbor, Washington. He resigned in 1997 to commence a full time itinerant ministry throughout the United States and overseas. David also taught in the Brownsville Revival School of Ministry in Pensacola, Florida as well as maintaining a busy itinerant ministry. During and following their time in Pensacola David traveled with Evangelist Steve Hill and the Awake America Crusades. You can find our more about his speaking and request him for your Church as this ministry website DavidRavenhill.com
